# SetRunPeriod

## Description
Sets the run period and timestep for simulation

## Modeler Description


## Measure Type
ModelMeasure

## Taxonomy


## Arguments


### Timesteps per hour
Number of simulation timesteps per hour
**Name:** timesteps_per_hour,
**Type:** Integer,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false

### Begin date
Simulation start date, YYYY-MM-DD format
**Name:** begin_date,
**Type:** String,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false

### End date
Simulation end date, YYYY-MM-DD format
**Name:** end_date,
**Type:** String,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false
